item.title: Semi-analytic Theories
item.description:
Semi-analytic theories to obtain the long-term evolution of the Universe and establish an unified theory

While numerical simulations investigate the details of individual objects, it is important to predict/explain the overall statistics to derive an unified paradigme for long-term evolution of the Universe. Observations are also snapshots.
